## NVD3 Plot Inline

```{r nvd3plot, results = 'asis', comment = NA, message = F, echo = F}
require(rCharts)
n1 <- nPlot(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars, type = 'scatterChart')
n1$show('inline')
```
